content:
TITLE: Requesting a Quote using LI.FI SDK
DESCRIPTION: Demonstrates how to request a quote for a cross-chain transaction, specifying the source and destination chains, tokens, and amount.
SOURCE: https://github.com/lifinance/sdk/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
import { ChainId, getQuote } from '@lifi/sdk'

const quote = await getQuote({
  fromAddress: '0xd8dA6BF26964aF9D7eEd9e03E53415D37aA96045',
  fromChain: ChainId.ARB,
  toChain: ChainId.OPT,
  fromToken: '0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000',
  toToken: '0x0000000000000000000000000000000000000000',
  fromAmount: '1000000000000000000',
})
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Initializing LI.FI SDK Configuration
DESCRIPTION: Creates the initial SDK configuration by setting up the integrator name for the application.
SOURCE: https://github.com/lifinance/sdk/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: typescript
CODE:
```
import { createConfig } from '@lifi/sdk'

createConfig({
  integrator: 'Your dApp/company name',
})
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing LI.FI SDK using Package Managers
DESCRIPTION: Commands to install the LI.FI SDK using either pnpm or npm package managers.
SOURCE: https://github.com/lifinance/sdk/blob/main/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm add @lifi/sdk
```

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
npm install --save @lifi/sdk
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Installing Dependencies with pnpm
DESCRIPTION: Command to install all required dependencies for the LI.FI SDK demo examples using pnpm package manager.
SOURCE: https://github.com/lifinance/sdk/blob/main/examples/node/README.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: bash
CODE:
```
pnpm i
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Markdown Changelog Entry Version 3.6.8
DESCRIPTION: Latest changelog entry showing bug fixes for process timestamps and EIP-5792 spec updates.
SOURCE: https://github.com/lifinance/sdk/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
### [3.6.8](https://github.com/lifinance/sdk/compare/v3.6.7...v3.6.8) (2025-04-15)

### Bug Fixes

* add more timestamps for processes ([#248](https://github.com/lifinance/sdk/issues/248)) ([90a7715](https://github.com/lifinance/sdk/commit/90a77159e55556c08b7cb9ba3c04cc0465522383))
* bump EIP-5792 specs ([#249](https://github.com/lifinance/sdk/issues/249)) ([3742296](https://github.com/lifinance/sdk/commit/3742296f35d72996dc497a4f51d3242fe77cdc60))
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Documentation - Version History Format
DESCRIPTION: Standard changelog entry format showing version numbers, comparison links, and categorized changes including features and bug fixes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/lifinance/sdk/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_1

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
### [0.4.10](https://github.com/lifinance/sdk/compare/v0.4.9...v0.4.10) (2022-03-20)

### Features

- add chains endpoint to SDK ([#46](https://github.com/lifinance/sdk/issues/46)) ([4b500d7](https://github.com/lifinance/sdk/commit/4b500d738303e1c67f54c929447157a1fab26f8a))
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Documentation - Bug Fix Entry Format
DESCRIPTION: Example of how bug fixes are documented in the changelog, including issue references and commit hashes.
SOURCE: https://github.com/lifinance/sdk/blob/main/CHANGELOG.md#2025-04-23_snippet_2

LANGUAGE: markdown
CODE:
```
### Bug Fixes

- store received token in execution object ([#45](https://github.com/lifinance/sdk/issues/45)) ([8115ccd](https://github.com/lifinance/sdk/commit/8115ccde4123c420d7e3f96b1e3e2b67c4773e68))
```

----------------------------------------

TITLE: Applying Apache License 2.0 Boilerplate Notice
DESCRIPTION: A template for the boilerplate notice to be included when applying the Apache License 2.0 to a project. It includes placeholders for the copyright year and owner name, as well as the full license text and conditions.
SOURCE: https://github.com/lifinance/sdk/blob/main/LICENSE.md#2025-04-23_snippet_0

LANGUAGE: plaintext
CODE:
```
   Copyright [yyyy] [name of copyright owner]

   Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0 (the "License");
   you may not use this file except in compliance with the License.
   You may obtain a copy of the License at

       http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0

   Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software
   distributed under the License is distributed on an "AS IS" BASIS,
   WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.
   See the License for the specific language governing permissions and
   limitations under the License.
```
